experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Univariate Timeseries analysis using Machine Learning:â€¢ Improved the percentage accuracy of the LSTM model by over 18% using the Root-Mean-Squared-Error (RMSE) as performance metric.â€¢ Used statistical models like STL Decomposition, X11 Decomposition to understand the fundamentals of time series forecasting.â€¢ Performed an in depth analysis on the working of an LSTM model and its hyperparameters on a time series dataset.â€¢ Created a univariate time series model using LSTM and fine tuned the base model to achieve consistent forecasting results on the dataset.
experience.description_html: Univariate Timeseries analysis using Machine Learning:â€¢ Improved the percentage accuracy of the LSTM model by over 18% using the Root-Mean-Squared-Error (RMSE) as performance metric.â€¢ Used statistical models like STL Decomposition, X11 Decomposition to understand the fundamentals of time series forecasting.â€¢ Performed an in depth analysis on the working of an LSTM model and its hyperparameters on a time series dataset.â€¢ Created a univariate time series model using LSTM and fine tuned the base model to achieve consistent forecasting results on the dataset.
